fd3e7eec-d6d1-4997-af10-1a161f9398cf.description: Earners of this badge attend and complete a MyLab Math and Stats Certification event. Elevate your knowledge of the MyLab platform and build greater confidence by maximizing what it can do for you & your students. Enhance engagement in your course by assigning at least one new feature or tool to save time & increase students success. Equip fellow faculty with a greater sense of ownership in their own MyLab by sharing your learnings with the department as a MyLab Ambassador.
